arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorPlayer, sWorldName)

	idAneta = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("DSQ_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_Aneta")[1]
	idAnetaArriveLoc = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("DSQ_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_AnetaArriveLoc")[1]
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAneta, idAnetaArriveLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idAneta, idAnetaArriveLoc)
	
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	-- Get references
	idGulyas = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "Gulyas")[1]
	idAnetaPlaceGoreLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AnetaPlaceGoreLoc")[1]
	idAnetaDrinkLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AnetaDrinkLoc")[1]
	idAnetaWaveEventLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "AnetaWaveEventLoc")[1]
	idGulyasWaveEventLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "GulyasWaveEventLoc")[1]
	idGulyasPostRiteLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "GulyasPostRiteLoc")[1]
	idVass = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "Vass")[1]
	idVera = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "Vera")[1]
	idVassRunLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "VassRunLoc")[1]
	idVeraRunLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "VeraRunLoc")[1]
	idBloodRing = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "BloodRing")[1]
	idBloodAltar = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "BloodAltar")[1]
	idVassAttackLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "VassAttackLoc")[1]
	idVeraFleeLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "VeraFleeLoc")[1]
	idVassCorpse = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "VassCorpse")[1]
	idVassFlames = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "VassFlames")[1]
	tVillagers = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("DSQ_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_VillagersAltar")
	tVillagerLocs = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("DSQ_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_VillagersLocs")
	tGore = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("DSQ_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_Gore")
	tSpawners = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("DSQ_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_Spawners")
	
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idAneta)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convGulyasGreet, idGulyas)
	Hydra.Wait(1.5)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAneta, idAnetaPlaceGoreLoc, "NPC_Walk_Fast", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idAneta, idAnetaPlaceGoreLoc)
	Hydra.QActorAnim(idAneta, "AnimKey_ItemGive")
	
	Hydra.Wait(5)
	for i, Gore in ipairs(tGore) do
		Hydra.ActorEnable(Gore)
	end
	
	Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idAneta, idGulyas)
	
end

function Start(idActorChargeable)

	for i, Spawner in ipairs(tSpawners) do
		Hydra.ActorDisable(Spawner)
	end
	
	tBeasts = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("DSQ_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_Beasts")
	
	if #tBeasts > 0 then
		for i, Beast in ipairs(tBeasts) do
			Hydra.ActorKill(Beast)
		end
	end
	
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerPhaseJump(idGulyas)
	Hydra.Wait(0.35)
	Hydra.ActorDisable(idBloodRing)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerPhaseJump(idAneta)
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(idAneta, "fxKit_harmless_flameAura_sorcFire")
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(idGulyas, "fxKit_damaging_persistentCast_2hand_blood")
	
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convGulyasEndRitual, idGulyas, idAneta)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idGulyas, idGulyasPostRiteLoc, "NPC_Walk", true)
	
	Hydra.QActorWait(idAneta, 0.5)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAneta, idAnetaDrinkLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idAneta, idAnetaDrinkLoc)
	Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(idAneta, "NPC_Standing_Drink")
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(idAneta)
	Hydra.Wait(1)

	
	Hydra.ActorEnable(idVass)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idVass, idVassRunLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	
	Hydra.ActorEnable(idVera)
	Hydra.QActorWait(idVera, 0.35)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idVera, idVeraRunLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idVera, idVeraRunLoc)
	Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(idVera, "NPC_Idle_Stand_Exhausted")
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convVassArrives, idVass, idVera, idAneta, idGulyas)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idVass, idVassRunLoc)
	Hydra.QActorWait(idVass, 25)
	Hydra.QActorAnim(idVass, "AnimKey_Point_Eyelevel")
	

	
	for i, Villager in ipairs(tVillagers) do

		Hydra.ActorEnable(Villager)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(Villager, tVillagerLocs[i], "NPC_Run", true)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(Villager, tVillagerLocs[i])
	
	end
	
	Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(idAneta)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAneta, idAnetaPlaceGoreLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idAneta, idVassRunLoc)
	Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idGulyas, idVeraRunLoc)
	
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convVassArrives)
	
	for i, Villager in ipairs(tVillagers) do
	
		Hydra.ActorSetTeam(Villager, Hydra.TEAM_MONSTER_DEFAULT)
	
	end
	
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idGulyas)
	Hydra.ActorSetTeam(idGulyas, Hydra.TEAM_PLAYER_DEFAULT)
	Hydra.ActorSetSheathPreference(idGulyas, 2)
	Hydra.QActorUnsheath(idGulyas)
	Hydra.ActorSetTeam(idAneta, Hydra.TEAM_PLAYER_DEFAULT)
	Hydra.QActorPhasedAnimLoop(idAneta, "AnimKey_Cower", 0)
	Hydra.ActorAddAITarget(tVillagers[3], idAneta)
	Hydra.ActorClearAnimSetOverride(idVera)
	
end

function Start(idActorKiller, idActorKilled)
	
	--Checking the distance from the center to determine if the monster is killed in the blood circle.
	--Any monsters killed inside the circle have an extra blood effect.
	if Hydra.ActorDistanceSquaredBetweenActors(idBloodRing, idActorKilled) <= N_QUEST_CREDIT_MAX_RADIUS_SQ then 
		Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idActorKilled, 4)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorKilled, EG_DEATH_CHARGED)
		Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectDuration(idActorKilled, 1)
		Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroupActorToActor(idActorKilled, idBloodAltar, fxBloodAttractor, false, "Default", "HP_chest")
		nBloodProgress = nBloodProgress + 5
		Hydra.EventSend("ValidBeastKill")
	end
	
	-- Set the chargeable progress.
	Hydra.ChargeableGizmoSetProgress(idBloodAltar, nBloodProgress)

end

function Start(idActorKiller, szGroup)

	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idGulyas, idGulyasPostRiteLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idGulyas, idVassCorpse)
	
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	Hydra.ActorSetPowerEffectSize(idVass, 5)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convVassAttacks, idVass, idVera, idAneta)
	Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idVass, idVera)
	Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idVera, idVass)
	Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idGulyas, idVera)
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idVass, idVassAttackLoc, "IGC_NPC_Walk_Slow", true)
	Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(idVass, "NPC_Idle_Stand_Strong")
	Hydra.QActorWait(idVera, 0.2)
	Hydra.QActorAnimLoop(idVera, "AnimKey_Backpedal", 4.5)
	Hydra.QActorAnim(idVera, "AnimKey_Talk_Scared")
	Hydra.ActorTriggerPhaseJump(idAneta)
	Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idAneta, idVass)
	Hydra.Wait(9)
	Hydra.QActorFaceActor(idAneta, idVassCorpse)
	Hydra.QActorPlayEffectGroup(idAneta, "fxKit_damaging_persistentCast_2hand_fire", true)
	Hydra.QActorAnim(idAneta, "AnimKey_Point_Eyelevel")
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffectByEffectGroupSNO(idAneta, "fxKit_damaging_persistentCast_2hand_fire")
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idVass, "fxKit_harmless_burst_ignite_fire", false)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idVass, "environmentVFX_fire_source_scalable_smokeless", true, Hydra.ACDID_INVALID, "HP_uniqueFX")
	Hydra.QActorSetAnimSetOverride(idVass, "NPC_Idle_Stand_Burn")
	Hydra.Wait(3)
	Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(idVass)
	Hydra.QActorPhasedAnimLoop(idVass, "AnimKey_Die_Phased", 0)
	Hydra.Wait(3)
	Hydra.ActorFadeAndDelete(idVass, 0.5)
	Hydra.ActorEnable(idVassCorpse)
	Hydra.Wait(2.5)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idVera, idVeraFleeLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idVera, 0.5)
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAneta, idVeraFleeLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idAneta, 0.5)

end

function Start(idActorNPC, sConversation, idActorPlayer)
	
	Hydra.Wait(0.5)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idGulyas, idGulyasWaveEventLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idGulyas, idGulyasWaveEventLoc)
	Hydra.QActorPhasedAnimLoop(idGulyas, "AnimKey_Chant_Ritual_Sky", 0)
	
	Hydra.QActorWait(idAneta, 0.5)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idAneta, idAnetaWaveEventLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idAneta, idAnetaWaveEventLoc)
	Hydra.QActorPhasedAnimLoop(idAneta, "AnimKey_Chant_Ritual_Ground", 0)
	
	Hydra.Wait(3.25)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idGulyas, "fxKit_damaging_persistentCast_2hand_blood", true)
	Hydra.Wait(0.35)
	Hydra.ActorEnable(idBloodRing)
	Hydra.Wait(1.5)
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idAneta, "fxKit_harmless_flameAura_sorcFire", true)
	Hydra.Wait(0.5)
	
	Hydra.EventSend("RiteStart")
	
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	
	-- Begin spawning monsters
	for i, Spawner in ipairs(tSpawners) do
		Hydra.ActorEnable(Spawner)
	end
	
end

unk_993f312:
-- CONSTANTS --
N_QUEST_CREDIT_MAX_RADIUS = 5.5
N_QUEST_CREDIT_MAX_RADIUS_SQ = math.pow(N_QUEST_CREDIT_MAX_RADIUS, 2) -- square it once, never have to do math again

-- VARIABLES --
nBloodProgress = 0
